phrases: You have not been taking your stuff home, huh.
Show me what you want to keep.
Ishikawa-kun, you sure have a lot of stuff.
You are supposed to take stuff home every day!
Do you have a free hand, Hori-san?
-Could ya help me out here, Hori?
Your arms are so strong, though!
Damn, Hori-san, you had this much crap piled up?!
Take all personal belongings home today!
Take all personal belongings home today!
Wait, you have like, no stuff at all.
Wait, you have like, no stuff at all.
Because I was a good boy and took it home every day!
Iura was doing his job and you guys were not?
Because I was a good boy and took it home every day!
Iura was doing his job and you guys were not?
Do not look at me like that.
Do not look at me like that.
Oh, I have got this CD!
This must have been one I forgot to give back to you.
Oh, snap, yeah, I will take it.
Come to think of it, I have some DVDs I borrowed off you.
Well, there goes my sweet, light-handed commute.
You still have way more than all of us, Yuki.
A couple of us stronger guys could help you carry it down to the entrance.
H-He means you are so dependable, Hori-san!
He did not mean anything insulting by it!
I Would Gift You The Sky
I Would Gift You The Sky
Remi, could you get the trash...?
Remi, could you get the trash...?
You want to go see a big herd of giraffes?
You want to go to the zoo, too, yeah?
Whoa, this is pretty far away.
We would have to make it a two-day trip.
You are going to make her think this might actually happen.
Sure would be nice to have one.
We could get to way more places.
I cannot wait to get my license.
If I had a car, I could take you anywhere you wanted, Remi, not just that zoo.
Perhaps this is not about going to the zoo, but something else?
I am going to go buy a drink!
We will not know unless you tell us.
So tell us what it is.
If you will not let us help you, then you are going to force my hand.
I will show Yanagi-kun what you look like with your cheeks all stretched out.
What on Earth is going on?!
Is this something you do often?!
Certainly you cannot force her to talk like... like...
Kono-san, Ayasaki-san cannot talk like this!
You do not get to see her like this that often.
Look, it is not bothering me or anything.
I just figured we could go somewhere fun while we are still in high school.
But as soon as you talked about getting a license,
I realized he could use it to go really far away.
Or he could just use it to do everyday errands.
Or he could just use it to do everyday errands.
I mean, we do not have to go to the zoo or anything.
I mean, we do not have to go to the zoo or anything.
You do not need to worry.
You will not treat me like a stranger the second you graduate?
That would be a lot of effort on our part.
Once I get my license, would you all like to go on a road trip?
L-Let us go to the ocean!
Are you fond of the ocean, Kono-san?
I-I want to go to the ocean, too!
I just want to see the ocean.
Then that is what we will do after graduation.
Let us go to the zoo, too, Yanagin!
Why do not you get your license, too, Ayasaki-san?
Makes sense after carrying all that heavy stuff.
Guess she just wanted a pillow.
She is frowning in her sleep.
She makes that face a lot, huh.
Hori-san, you are going to end up with wrinkles on your forehead.
She eats a lot, moves a lot, and sleeps a lot.
I hope these days never end.
If that tiny happenstance had not occurred...
Are our graduation essays due on the last day of school?
They took our graduation picture super long ago, huh.
I have no idea what I look like in mine.
-I was next to a guy I would never spoken to before.
-I was next to a guy I would never spoken to before.
I do not even remember if I said anything.
You are in the same class, though!
You want to go to karaoke today?
How did your sister do on that exam?
I was just in the student council room...
She looked so much better with long hair.
You know that shop you told us about before?
Taking my stuff home is such a pain...
Ugh, taking my stuff home is such a pain.
I should have brought it home ages ago.
I should have just brought it home ages ago.
-All students, please head home so the all-staff meeting may begin.
-All students, please head home so the all-staff meeting may begin.
-All students, please head home so the all-staff meeting may begin.
We have a whole'nother week until graduation...
I hope it will be warmer for graduation.
My high school days feel like they amounted to nothing.
I know there is no point considering it.
But it was not hypothetical for you.
What is got you all spaced out?
So many coincidences brought me here.
What would it be like if one of them did not happen?
Sounds like the fact that we are here together now is the work of fate.
It was never completely unfathomable, but it is real.
I am here with them now.
Even if the fate you mentioned does not really exist,
I am sure the world would slowly but surely
move in the direction I want it to.
Next, the farewell address from our graduating student representative,
Next, the farewell address from our graduating student representative,
and so, too, is the graduation day for the 63rd class of Katagiri High School.
All graduating students, please return to your classrooms.
I did not do it on purpose!
C'mon, dude, should the graduating student speaker be sprinting through the halls?
So what were you chasing Miyamura for?
What do you think I was chasing him for?!
I have got to apologize to him later.
They found out about the piercings.
I have a lot of friends, plus a girlfriend.
I promise I will not pretend you are not there anymore.
C'mon, Miyamura, we are going to take a class photo!
You got to hurry back, or...
Ugh, where the hell is our class?
Ugh, where the hell is our class?
Ugh, where the hell is our class?
Sensei, let us take a picture together!
You are supposed to take pictures of all of us, Yasuda!
Why would I take pictures of guys?
I will grab a snapshot of you with my eyes.
This is a big life moment!
Get a picture of us, please!
I am so sad I will not get to see you anymore!
Y-You can still come over to see me!
Might as well let her have it, then.
I am looking for Remi, have you seen her?
I had so much fun this year.
I had the best time of my life,
and part of that was because of you, Ishikawa-kun.
Guess she is trying to leave her feelings behind at school.
I needed to tell you something.
I would like to go somewhere with everyone after graduation.
We had this conversation with the student council the other day.
It made me think, once I get my license...
All of us best buds could travel!
Nothing's going to change after graduation, and if it does, that is fine.
Now there is my special boy!
I want to get a picture with my wonderful kid!
Why the hell are you here, Dad?!
I am here to have Dad fun!
Get out of here before someone sees you in this ridiculous outfit!
Where is your mom and dad?!
They were here for a bit, but had to head home for work.
Man, why you got to be so mad?
You come to pick your big brother up?
Mom said she wanted you home early.
Plus I figured I could see what my new school would be like.
God, that ceremony was so long!
Why did they talk so much?
Okey-dokey, let us get our butts home, Moto!
Nice to see Iura peppy till the end.
We are going to go get sushi, want to come?!
Kyosuke's going to be so thrilled, like, annoyingly so.
There is no distance between us.
I have never been this close to a person before.
There is no boundary between us.
I used to be terrified of that.
I was so scared of this, Hori-san.
I do not think either of us knew
how scary or nerve-wracking being yourself around others could be.
But you made me realize all of it.
What can I do for you?
How can I make you smile?
You are so much stronger than I think you are,
and you are so much weaker than I feel you are.
That is why wherever you go, bright, sunny days follow after.
For years, the only person I knew this well was myself.
I never knew a world like this even existed.
Thank you for shattering my reality.
Thank you for wanting a future with me.
What can I do for you?
How can I repay you for what you have done?
The spring sky is bluer than I have ever seen.
If only I could gift you this wonderful sky.
No, I know what you would like better.
A cake with lots of whipped cream on top.
